name: Whirly Word HD
summary:
Whirly Word HD - a fantastic new word game, with over 7,500 puzzles. Dont worry about getting stuck, with a built in dictionary players can lookup definitions while playing!   Our Abridged Dictionary puzzles use words that you will recognize or take a plunge into the Tournament Dictionary for a brain boggling experience.

 Challenge your vocabulary prowess and play until you win!   If you enjoy playing games like Text Twist, Scrabble, Boggle or Word Scramble then Whirly Word is the game for you!
